name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HN Notifier - Hacker News Reply Notifications

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Notifies you via in-app bell and email when you get a new reply on HackerNews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notifies you via in-app notification center and email when you get a new reply on HackerNews (https://news.ycombinator.com). This extension uses Engagespot to deliver notifications.

Privacy Note: This extension does not collect any of your private data such as cookies or sessions.
